channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- 10w (Type 82ST, 82SU) Laptop (Lenovo) BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- 10w (Type 82ST, 82SU) Laptop (Lenovo) BIOS

item.title: CVE-2024-7756|2024-09-16T17:51:12.837Z -- lenovo -- 10w%20%28type%2082st%2C%2082su%29%20laptop%20%28lenovo%29%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the ThinkPad L390 Yoga and 10w Notebook that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges by accessing an embedded UEFI shell.
